info.name: Jet Stream Pattern
info.description: Ever notice how a jet of water (or pee) does a cool shape right out the nozzle? Well this is a simulation of substances with multiple densities flowing through each other

renderpass.name: Image
Buffer A

renderpass.code:
#define R iResolution.xy
#define A(U) texture(iChannel0, (U)/R)
#define B(U) texture(iChannel1, (U)/R)
#define C(U) texture(iChannel2, (U)/R)
#define D(U) texture(iChannel3, (U)/R)

#define MIN .1
#define MAX .8
#define JET vec2(.9,0.)
#define G vec2(0,9.8)
#define SOURCE 40.
renderpass.name: Common
Buffer B
Buffer C
Buffer D
